mapper.select: select a.company_no , a.contract_no , a.contract_name , a.contract_date , a.contractor , a.contract_period , a.start_date , a.end_date , a.monetary_unit , a.exchange_rate , sum(isnull(b.amount, 0)) as amount , sum(isnull(b.discounted_amount, 0)) as discounted_amount , sum(isnull(b.actual_amount, 0)) as actual_amount , a.remark , a.regist_datetime , a.regist_company , a.regist_user , a.modify_datetime , a.modify_company , a.modify_user from contract as a left outer join license as b on a.company_no = b.company_no and a.contract_no = b.contract_no where a.company_no = #{companyNo} group by a.company_no , a.contract_no , a.contract_name , a.contract_date , a.contractor , a.contract_period , a.start_date , a.end_date , a.monetary_unit , a.exchange_rate , a.remark , a.regist_datetime , a.regist_company , a.regist_user , a.modify_datetime , a.modify_company , a.modify_user;
